content:
balance as at 30 September 2022 CNY687K of utilities paid on behalf of Haining Wanpu
As indicated by management, the Target accrued 6.9% bad debt provision for utilities receivables aged within 1 year.

SUMMARY: Used entity 'Haining Wanpu' with amounts: CNY687K (total receivables), CNY738K (utilities paid), CNY51K (provision)
